pkgmetadata.longdescription: _ _ _ _ __ (_) | ___ ___ _ __ ___ _ __ __ _| |_ | '_ \| | |_____ / __/ _ \| '_ ` _ \| '_ \ / _` | __| | |_) | | |_____| (_| (_) | | | | | | |_) | (_| | |_ | .__/|_|_| \___\___/|_| |_| |_| .__/ \__,_|\__| |_| |_| pillow has modules named PIL.Image*. PIL has them as Image.*.This is a package which shims between the two.Run `materialise.py` to generate the Image* modules in source, and `setup.py`can then generate your wheel or sdist.Email me if you have confusion: alistair@alynn.co.uk
